Html: Hi, thanks for a great library! I find it very useful but the autogenerated code that gets added when installing the library with Nuget is annoying. I think a lot of people are adding MVVM Light for a specific feature, maybe late in development and don't want their projects mangled by this code. Would you please consider removing it or at least consider the project type before adding it. Today I got an App.xaml file added to my UserControl project which I clearly do not want.

Hi,

There is a package called "MVVM Light libraries only" which doesn't add any XAML files. I will try to improve the discoverability of this package.

Thanks

Laurent
